question.question: What is the most appropriate treatment for a convulsive seizure during alcohol withdrawal?
question.option_b: High-dose parenteral vitamin B1 supplementation before any infusion of serum glucose and polyvitamins
question.option_c: Intravenous rehydration and correction of hydroelectrolytic disorders
question.option_d: Treatment with high-dose diazepam tapering off over 7 to 10 days
